website_summaries.verdict: Has 3 different brushing modes, so you can find the best one to clean effectively around braces.
pros: Electric toothbrush that holds a charge for up to 2 weeks of uses
Soft brushing mode works nicely to remove food particles from around braces
Low price point for an electronic toothbrush
Includes a timer to remind you how long to brush
cons: Not quite as powerful as some other models

customer_reviews.title: Extreme fire hazard. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: The price is great but the device is an extreme fire hazard. The base caught fire in our bathroom while charging and cause significant damage to our countertop and wall. If this device was charging on a wood or other flammable surface we would have had a major fire. The flames emitted by the charger were very violent like a blow torch or cutting torch. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lakich

customer_reviews.title: Great sonic toothbrush/ Great price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is a great toothbrush for me and my husband. As a dental hygienist, I often recommend powered toothbrushes to my patients. It is nice to have one that is efficient at plaque removal and reasonably priced too!
customer_reviews.author: Oxyem

customer_reviews.title: Good Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great toothbrush, it works well and the battery life is good too. The only qualm I have is that the brush heads aren't that great, they're too soft - but luckily you can buy brush heads elsewhere and swap them out pretty easily. This is a great, lower priced electric toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several weeks and have been satisfied with the cleaning results and overall quality of the instrument. The vibrating head is strong enough to assist in cleaning plaque from tooth surfaces yet, gentle enough to prevent gum abrasion. The replaceable head lasts more than two months with soft non-abrasive bristles that do not easily fray. The rechargeable hand grip keeps a strong charge for days. I was skeptical initially but, I am now favorably impressed. I have been a dentist in general practice for more than thirty years and will recommend this product to my patients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these for my kids and they’ve been brushing more thoroughly ever since! Plus, since each came with two different color brush heads (ours came with 1 green and 1 blue each), we just used a different color on each and it helps the kids to be able to tell whose is who’s. Great design, the charging base doesn’t take up much space and I love that the brush buzzes every 30 seconds to help my kids learn to spend more time on each of the four sections: top front, top back, bottom front, bottom back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thue

customer_reviews.title: Great electric toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: Love this electric toothbrush! I was tired of paying so much for ''name brand" electric toothbrushes that cost 10 times as much. Price is great! Recommend to anyone! Works even better I think to clean off plaque. And it has the timer on it - it stops vibrating for a split second 4 times and stops after 2 minutes. Love the rose gold color too!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: So very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the self-timing setting on this. You have four 30-second cycles so you can concentrate on one quarter of your mouth at a time. The toothbrush action stops for approximately one second as an indicator to brush the next quadrant. The brush heads are very gentle... and it even comes with a replacement head.
customer_reviews.author: Living in the Desert

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want an expensive multi-gadget product. I just wanted an electric toothbrush. It is slim, easy to handle and holds a charge for at least 2 weeks. For a less expensive toothbrush, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Awen

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Brushes don’t last long but it will stat charges for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than manual toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. It seems to give a thorough cleaning. Sometimes it hits my teeth (but that's probably my fault).
customer_reviews.author: Briolette

customer_reviews.title: lasted a whole month with out charging.
customer_reviews.text: this toothbrush is a most have.! I bought this for my wife for Christmas yes Christmas and she did not charge it for a month used it twice a day every day and still had more power and lasted way longer the the (O. B. brush) I got for my self. it has 3 settings. Trust me you will not be disappointed.. get it get it get it...
customer_reviews.author: teady

customer_reviews.title: Love the time intervals so I can make sure I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the time intervals so I can make sure I get all of my teeth. Never used a Sonicare, but I feel like this keeps my teeth nice and clean :)
customer_reviews.author: Charlo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these for the stocking stuffers for Christmas everyone is pleased and enjoy using these toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Love it teeth feel came from the dentist
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this toothbrush perfect great deal for the money
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again. My new go to toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush. So affordable and yet sturdy the quality it wonderful. Hold a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using the brush gives a nice feeling of cleanliness, it's pleasant
customer_reviews.author: kindlenewbie

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard for my liking
customer_reviews.text: GOt 2 ONe for me and one for my fiance. He loves his, but it is a bit too hard for me
customer_reviews.author: Jamyn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this toothbrush! Used Oral B for several years and wanted to try out a sonic brush. It has been great and the unit holds a charge for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Brush heads are too large for Kids.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my young children. Ages 2-10. Description says kids however the brush heads provided a certainly way too large for children. It is super lightweight, sleek looking and very strong vibration. 4 stars simply because the description is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia J.

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT GET MY REFUND, ITEM DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: TOOTHBRUSH STOPPED WORKING WITHIN 1 WEEK RETURNED ITEM AND DID NOT GET MY REFUND
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Works really well no issues, cleans teeth great.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well no issues, cleans teeth great. WIll purchase in the future again.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Saenz Caperon

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent toothbrush that cleans throughly and would love to buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent toothbrush that cleans throughly and would love to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Enrique W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. Really appreciate the value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Glen

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 6 weeks only
customer_reviews.text: i wish you make better product . i would like to get it replaced thank you
customer_reviews.author: marc dibbini

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month and now it doesn't vibrate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived well and it is as described, everything OK
customer_reviews.author: Mayra C

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: The speeds, my teeth are sensitive & it's perfect for that
customer_reviews.author: kkhud

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product that gets the job done. Easy to use works well and comes precharged. Extra toothbrush head comes with it. Packaged well and arrived on time. Lightweight and also has automatic timer built in. Three settings (clean, sensitive, & massage) preprogrammed into the main body. Charges quick and easily. Would give five stars, but it’s extremely lightweight which makes it seem a bit flimsy and fragile. As long as you’re responsible with it and treat the product well it should last. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: Came fast, works great, when needed I will order another!!
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush! I had the expensive ones and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to edit my previous review since my toothbrush just died. I didn’t have it for two months and it will no longer charge! I am quite sad since I loved this toothbrush. Previous Review: Great toothbrush! I had the expensive ones and they did not clean near as well. This is amazing! A great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Armedes

customer_reviews.title: Whitens
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush! Almost bought a more expensive toothbrush, but glad I didn't. Who the heck needs a Bluetooth toothbrush?! This is a great price, and I've had compliments on my teeth looking whiter.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E.

customer_reviews.title: This toothbrush has many good features about it
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush has many good features about it. It is easy to keep clean, is attractive, has a charging light . I would have given it the highest rating other from the fact when I use it, for whatever reason when it hits certain parts of my mouth it sounds and feels like a grinder which hit a rough spot. I have tried to find a way to avoid this obnoxious feeling, unfortunately without success.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The best toothbrush. Love the different settings
customer_reviews.text: The best toothbrush. Love the different settings, came with two brush heads, and with one charge it will lost me a whole month.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela M.

customer_reviews.title: Really love especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really love especially for the price! The batter life is awesome! This is my first electric toothbrush, so not much to compare to, but works great and really hoping for a good report from the dentist. Did take some getting used to. They are messy to learn! Very happy. Thinking i may get one for the hubby for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: one day at a time

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Electric Toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price, performance and value! One charge lasts a few days. 3 speed settings are very gentle yet thorough on my mouth. MUST BUY if you're looking for a budget electric toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Good!!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a week. Seems just as good as my expensive one that just died after 3 years..Can't beat the price. Just purchased 2 more for my adult children for Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: comfy shoes

customer_reviews.title: Good tooth brush with unbeatable price!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Didn’t want to spend a lot of money on electric toothbrush. Was hesitant because this product was so affordable was afraid the quality would be poor but I could not of been more wrong great product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gordon!

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel of the toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just as well as my old Sonicare toothbrush. Love the look and feel of the toothbrush. One toothbrush head has held up for quite a while. The only reason I give this 4/5 stars is that I don't love the built in feature that briefly pauses the toothbrush at every 30 second mark. I'd rather it just turn off at the end of the two minute brushing window.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Diamond replacement
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Replaced my wife’s diamondclean and seems to work the same for a fraction of the price. Philips offered me like 40% after that brush failed after a few years, but that still would have been like $100 on their site
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: NOISY
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how well this product worked because I couldn't get past the noise. Not only could my husband hear it in the other room but it vibrated all through my head and gave me a headache. I returned it ASAP
customer_reviews.author: CuriousA71

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Went to this toothbrush because I am brushing too hard according to my dentist - this is working great! Teeth much cleaner & less plaque build up too.
customer_reviews.author: Karla P.

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my wife and she loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife and she loves it Only I hope I can buy replacement brushes for it I’m sure I can I hope
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brushes break easily, order extra.
customer_reviews.text: I love the electric toothbrush but my first toothbrush just broke off, after 1 week. Poor quality brushes! Or a defective one, otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: darlene spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: effective but gentle brush; doesn't take up too much counter space. seller delivered securely, quickly and true to description
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My teeth feel cleaner and are significantly whiter.
customer_reviews.author: tjb

customer_reviews.title: ... it doesn't brush too hard and it has a nice two minute timer
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush really did the trick it doesn't brush too hard and it has a nice two minute timer. I really like it! Definitely worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift and my sister loves it,
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Varilek

customer_reviews.title: VALUE
customer_reviews.text: almost as good as my sonicare and MUCH MORE AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.author: shirley jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Super excited about gifting this.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item in two days through prime. Awesome product so far for the price I paid. I will be gifting this and I know they will love it! Looks just as pictured! Maybe even better in person! Quality look really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

product_meta.title: Mornwell Sonic Electric Toothbrush Rechargeable Toothbrush with Smart Timers & 2 Brush Heads for Adult, Women & Kids (Over 8 Years Old) -Pink
feature_bullets: Professional Oral Care. 3 brushing modes (Clean, Soft, Massage) with 31000 vibrations per minute dynamic cleaning action, more effective in reducing plaque than a manual toothbrush
The Dupont Nylon brush color fade to remind you of replacing it every 3 months. 2 minutes timer with interval pause reminding per 30 seconds

Inductive Charger. Working over 2 weeks (twice a day) once fully charged, it's the best partner for your daily oral care and travel holidays. Overcharging protection and anti-slip rubber feet make it safe and stable

Elegant Designed. Lightweight and smooth surface, IPX7 waterproof solid body with anti-skid grooves, less noise and the special designed elegant color, ideal gifts for your kids and female families or friends
Package includes 1pc toothbrush, 2pcs replacement heads, 1pc charging dock. 24hr/7d pleased customer service
